outline:
1. to be perverse, twist, pervert, make crooked, prove perverse, declare perverse
    1. (Niphal) to be crooked
    2. (Piel) to twist, distort, pervert, make crooked
    3. (Hiphil) to declare crooked
    4. (Qal) perverse
strongs_def: to knot or distort; figuratively, to pervert (act or declare perverse)
